author: lzybkr
body:
dotnet cli has added support for templates to create new projects, see https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/dotnet/2017/02/07/announcing-net-core-tools-updates-in-vs-2017-rc/

There should be a template for creating PowerShell modules to help people get started.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: That's for a script module, right?  I'm suggesting we should plug into dotnet cli better for binary modules.

comments.author: tintoy
comments.body:
I built one of these a while back, and after reading this, figured I may as well contribute what I've got:

https://github.com/tintoy/ps-binary-module-template

(I have templates for [manifest-based modules](https://github.com/DimensionDataResearch/cloudcontrol-powershell-core/blob/master/src/DD.CloudControl.Powershell/DD.CloudControl.Powershell.csproj#L14-L18), too)

Feel free to reuse it if that's helpful :)

title: Add support for templates when creating new modules
